articles.description: The FIA will take action to ensure the problematic Turn 6 right-hander in Austin will be policed for track limits next year after complaints that certain drivers, including Red Bull’s Sergio Perez and Williams driver Alex Albon, were getting away with routine…

articles.title: Borussia Dortmund team bus gets parking fine in Tynemouth - BBC.com
articles.description: The German Bundesliga club beat Newcastle United 1-0 in Wednesday's Champions League tie.
articles.content:
The Borussia Dortmund team bus has been slapped with a £50 fine while parked up in Tynemouth.
It follows the club's 1-0 win over Newcastle United at St James' Park in Wednesday's Champions League ga… [+1828 chars]
